invert.description: Inverts the color scheme of the toaster.
invert.description_zh: 反转烤面包机的配色方案.

theme.description: Specifies the theme of the toaster.

position.type: top-left / top-right / bottom-left / bottom-right / top-center / bottom-center
position.description: Sets the position of the toaster on the screen.
position.description_zh: 设置烤面包机在屏幕上的位置.

richColors.description: Enables rich colors for the toaster.
richColors.description_zh: 为烤面包机启用丰富的颜色.

duration.description: Sets the duration for which the toast is visible.
duration.description_zh: 设置烤面包可见的持续时间.

gap.description_zh: 指定烤面包之间的间隙.

visibleToasts.description: Sets the number of visible toasts.
visibleToasts.description_zh: 设置可见烤面包的数量.

closeButton.description: Enables the close button on the toaster.
closeButton.description_zh: 在烤面包机上启用关闭按钮.

toastOptions.description_zh: 指定单个烤面包的选项.

offset.description: Specifies the offset for the toaster.
offset.description_zh: 指定烤面包机的偏移量.

dir.description: Sets the text direction for the toaster.
dir.description_zh: 设置烤面包机的文本方向.

containerAriaLabel.description: ARIA label for the toaster container.
containerAriaLabel.description_zh: 烤面包机容器的 ARIA 标签.

pauseWhenPageIsHidden.description: Pauses the toaster when the page is hidden.
pauseWhenPageIsHidden.description_zh: 当页面隐藏时暂停烤面包机.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Fires when the value of the menu changes.
events.description_zh: 当菜单的值更改时触发。
